shortDescription: A Remote Code Execution vulnerability has been found in Inspur ClusterEngine V4.0. A remote attacker can send a malicious login packet to the control server
vulnerabilityName: inspur clusterengine Improper Neutralization of Argument Delimiters in a Command ('Argument Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
